name: WizerFood
0:
”Alexa, ask WiserFood what I have planned for dinner today.”
”Alexa, tell me my WizerFood alerts.”
”Alexa, tell WiserFood to add bananas to my shopping list.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wiser food
Developer Terms of Use
des:
WizerFood is more than a calendar app: it can track your grocery needs based on scheduled meals, compare this to what's potentially already on your shelf, and make suggestions to ensure you're using your shelf effectively. Efficiency means many things to WizerFood, including cutting grocery bills, reducing time spent shopping, not missing as many items while shopping, reducing food waste, and more!

Profile settings let you define your goals, such as focusing on budget, healthy choices or preparation time - among many other options. The app also goes beyond food, letting you keep track of anything measurable: your weight, your blood pressure, how far or long you exercise, etc. You can also add income and expense details, including recurring ones, which lets the app create a useful picture of possible future cash flow.

This skill requires a WizerFood account, which can be created for free at www.wizerfood.com.
